parameters.name: AcceptLanguage
parameters.description:
The language of the response. Valid values:

*   zh: Chinese
*   en: English

parameters.name: ClusterType
parameters.description:
The type of the instance. Valid values:

*   Nacos-Ans
*   ZooKeeper
*   Eureka

parameters.name: OriginInstanceAddress
parameters.description: The address of the source instance node.

parameters.name: OriginInstanceName
parameters.description: The name of the source instance.

parameters.name: OriginInstanceNamespace
parameters.description: The list of namespaces. This parameter is optional if you want to migrate applications from a Nacos instance.

parameters.name: RequestPars
parameters.description: The extended request parameters in the JSON format.

parameters.name: TargetClusterName
parameters.description: The name of the destination instance.

parameters.name: TargetClusterUrl
parameters.description: The URL of the destination instance.

parameters.name: TargetInstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the destination instance.
